title: main leader is not getting clubs tag
body: riot I've been having a problem with club tag issue. since I am the main leader of that team it wont even show my tag or that am in a clan at all. but my friends said that am still part of it and that their tag is show in games but me. so far the main leader is the one with issues. is bothering a lot. it makes me feel like am  not in a clam at all

replies.body:
You're still in the Club, but this is a visual issue we're aware of that popped up after the Clubs re-enable. We're working on a solution that will roll out when it's ready, but I can't provide an ETA on when that will deploy.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BnE7IM9j,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-07T02:55:44.587+0000)
>
> You're still in the Club, but this is a visual issue we're aware of that popped up after the Clubs re-enable. We're working on a solution that will roll out when it's ready, but I can't provide an ETA on when that will deploy.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

thanks , that's all I wanted to know, good luck fixing it man
